description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 1-4 local player action scrolling solar system space shooter where for once you can control the aliens.  Battle across 9 varied stages and choose from 9 different weapon systems as you struggle to liberate the planets from the evil xeno.
description.short: 1-4 local player action scrolling solar system space shooter where for once you can control the aliens.  Battle across 9 varied stages and choose from 9 different weapon systems as you struggle to liberate the planets from the evil xeno.
